title: What is Mastodon?
description: This is the first video in a new series about making a Mastodon Bot. Mastodon is a decentralized open source social media platform.  Please note that the server choochoo.space which I discussed in this video is no longer available. To find a server, visit [https://joinmastodon.org/servers](joinmastodon.org).

timestamps.title: federation - all instances communicate with each other

links.title: Mastodon Repository
links.description: Mastodon is a free, open-source social network server based on ActivityPub where users can follow friends and discover new ones.
